It is hearsay? I think Howard Stern knows his contract and he stated this on this mornings show.
Your supposition is hearsay. Please review Howard's contract for factual information, but for now we can compromise.
Rv, vandalism. Howard has said himself “The Friday Show” is occasional. He is broadcasting tomorrow, which is Friday.
Either you are lying, or you just don't know yet. Boy will your face be Redd when the truth comes out.
Check your information Re: Broadcast Schedule. Stern is slated to broadcast 4 days a week, 9 months a year
Edited for poor grammar and repetative information which is included in "Television Shows"
/* Former Regulars and Celebrity Guests */ Most of these (well all) were regulars.
[[The Howard Stern Show Guests]] too much for one wikipage. Moved it to another article
That was two completely different interviews and two completely different answers to questions.
The whole article has been vandalized within the last edits. Opie & Anthony fans can continue spreading lies on the Opie & Anthony forums, not on Wikipedia.
Show is broadcast M-Th, The aptly named "Friday Show" may include call-ins from Stern but by no means is he broadcasting.
Wikipedia is neither a place for unauthorized biographies nor an advertising resources. This page needs serious edits.
/* Goodbye to terrestrial radio */ reverting to last edit with minor factual changes due to unverifyable comments and sillyness
